name: NFL Blitz
description: NFL BLITZ is the NFL at its finest, featuring easy to run plays and unparalleled action all in breakneck speed. With no penalties, no substitutions and nowhere to hide, NFL BLITZ is more than a game, it's an NFL highlight film! Featuring all the bone-crunching, fast-paced, hard-hitting football fun you expect from the arcade hit - only smaller! Every one of the 30 NFL teams are included in this 7-on-7 pigskin extravaganza! Feel free to mash the competition using each of the 18 offensive plays and 9 defensive plays.
